name: Sage's Passage
flavorText: The ancient sage Imris crafted the original version of these boots to protect him while he traveled the world, seeking a way to retune the Worldstone to restore the power of the nephalem.
flavorTextHtml: The ancient sage Imris crafted the original version of these boots to protect him while he traveled the world, seeking a way to retune the Worldstone to restore the power of the nephalem.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +250 Strength    
 +250 Dexterity    
 +250 Intelligence    
 +250 Vitality(3) Set:     
 Double the amount of Death's Breath that drop. (Emanates)
